briefdescription.para: File descriptor to open and wake master from CLI.
Requests master instance and creates a domain for a master.

simplesect.para: Keep in mind that created master and domain are global variables.

briefdescription.para: Defines default connected slaves based on number of slaves. Specifies its position, vendor id , product code etc. Default connected slaves considered implementation specific. In our case it will be 3 motors and one EasyCAT slave.
Passes your defined slave to EthercatNode class.

parameterdescription.para: first create your own EthercatSlave instance and modify it then pass it to configuration.
specify the physical connection position for your custom configured slave.

briefdescription.para: Obtains slave configuration for all slaves w.r.t master.
Set mode to ProfilePositionMode with specified parameters for servo drive on that position.

parameterdescription.para: Profile position parameter structure specified by user.

briefdescription.para: Set the mode to ProfilePositionMode with specified Parameters for all servo drives on the bus.

parameterdescription.para: Profile position parameter structure specified by user.

briefdescription.para: Set mode to ProfileVelocityMode with specified parameters for servo drive on that position.

parameterdescription.para: Profile velocity parameter structure specified by user.

briefdescription.para: Set mode to ProfileVelocityMode with specified parameters for all servo drives on the bus.

parameterdescription.para: Profile velocity parameter structure specified by user.

briefdescription.para: Set the Cyclic Sync Position Mode Parameters for slave in specified physical position w.r.t. master.

parameterdescription.para: Physical position of slave to be configured

briefdescription.para: Sets the Cyclic Synchronous Position Mode Parameters for all connected motor driver slaves.
Set the Cyclic Sync Velocity Mode Parameters for slave in specified physical position w.r.t. master.

parameterdescription.para: Physical position of slave to be configured

briefdescription.para: Sets the Cyclic Synchronous Velocity Mode Parameters for all connected motor driver slaves.
Set the Cyclic Sync Torque Mode Parameters for slave in specified physical position w.r.t. master.

parameterdescription.para: Physical position of slave to be configured

briefdescription.para: Sets the Cyclic Synchronous Torque Mode Parameters for all connected motor driver slaves.
Maps default SDOs which can be found.
Maps default PDOs for the application.

simplesect.para: This method is specific to our implementation. However you can modify it to suit your needs. If you have different topology or different servo drives use MapCustomPdos() function or modify this function based on your needs.

inbodydescription.para:
This part is specific for our Custom EASYCAT slave configuration To create your custom slave and variables you can add variables to
OffsetPDO struct. Also you have add your variables to received data structure, you may have to create your custom msg files as well.

briefdescription.para: Map Custom PDO based on your PDO mappings.

simplesect.para: You have to specify slave syncs and slave pdo registers before using function

parameterdescription.para: Physical position of your slave w.r.t master

briefdescription.para: Configures DC sync for our default configuration.
Configures DC synchronization for specified slave position.

parameterdescription.para: Activating DC synchronization for slave. 0x300 for Elmo | and same for EasyCAT

simplesect.para: Assign activate parameters specified in slaves ESI file

briefdescription.para: This function will check slave's application layer states. (INIT/PREOP/SAFEOP/OP)
This function will check master's state, in terms of number of responding slaves and their application layer states.
Reads the state of a domain. Stores the domain state in the given state structure. Using this method, the process data exchange can be monitored in realtime.
Activates master, after this function call realtime operation can start.

simplesect.para: Before activating master all configuration should be done
After calling this function you have to register domain(s) and start realtime task.

briefdescription.para: Registers domain for each slave. This method has to be called after ecrt_master_activate() to get the mapped domain process data memory.

Puts all slave to operational mode. User must call this before entering real-time operation. Reason for this function is that, master and slave has to do several exchange before becoming operational. So this function does exchange between master and slaves for up to 10 sec, could finish earlier. If timeout occurs it will return -1.
Opens EtherCAT master via command line tool if it's not already on.
Get the Number Of physically Connected Slaves to the bus.And checks if specified NUM_OF_SLAVES is correct.

simplesect.para: 0 if NUM_OF_SLAVES setting is correct, otherwise -1.

briefdescription.para: Get the information of physically connected slaves to the master. This function will return connected slave's vendor id, product code.
Deactivates master, and it is used to stop cyclic PDO exchange.

simplesect.para: That calling this function means that your PDO exchange will stop.
Additionally all pointers created by requesting master are freed with this function./ If you want to resume your communication, you'll have to do the configuration again.

briefdescription.para: Deactivates and releases master shouldn't be called in real-time.
Shutdowns EtherCAT master via command line tool if it's not already off.
Restarts Ethercat master via command line tool.
Writes SDO in real-time context.
Reads SDO in real-time context by creating read request.
This function reads data from specified index and subindex via SDO, returned data will be stored in pack.data which needs to be casted to correct data type afterwards.

simplesect.para: This is a blocking function, until response has been received.Don't use it in real-time context!!.

parameterdescription.para: SDO_data struct which contains; index,subindex,data size, and data that will be used to store read data.

briefdescription.para: This function writes data to specified index and subindex via SDO.

simplesect.para: This is a blocking function, until response has been received.Don't use it in real-time context!!.

parameterdescription.para: SDO_data struct which contains; index,subindex,data size and data to be written.

briefdescription.para: Get the Status Word from CiA402 slaves in specified index via SDO communication.
Writes control word to slave in specified index via SDO.
Reads current operational mode from slave in specified index via SDO.
Reads actual velocity value from slave in specified index via SDO.

simplesect.para: actual velocity value of selected slave.

briefdescription.para: Writes target velocity value via SDO to slave in specified index.
Read actual position from slave in specified index via SDO.
Writes target position value via SDO to slave in specified index.
Read actual torque value from slave in specified index via SDO.
Writes target torque value to slave in specified index via SDO.
Enable CiA402 supported motor drives in specified index via SDO.
Disable CiA402 supported motor drives in specified index via SDO.
